data.title: THE RED BADGE OF COURAGE

data.text:
Recommended in Program(s): Challenge I

Cycle(s): N/A

The Red Badge of Courage provides an empowering stage for the struggles of maturity. Though students may not face literal war as Henry Fleming does, Henry’s inner battles between glory and true honor, bravery and safety, speak to anyone coming of age. Through Stephen Crane’s characteristic realism, students examine themselves as well as Henry, processing the responsibility that comes with freedom.
